key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and semiconductor shortages
Market concentration in the automotive sector, making revenue susceptible to cyclical downturns
Intense competitive pressures in the semiconductor industry
Regulatory risks from stringent safety and emissions standards
